name: BugBurgh
description:
WELCOME TO BUGBURGH!

Care for a little village of cute lil bugs!
Explore the forest, forage for food, gather resources, construct little houses and buildings, watch the little village grow and try to keep everyone happy!
How many bugs can you care for? How many bugs is too many bugs?

Arrow keys for movement
C to interact
X to use item/cancel
S and D for inventory

A game by Francis Coulombe and Axolotine, with music by AskiiSoft.

Made for Ludum Dare 40!
